markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flinging Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=408) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Aggressive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=363) or [Brutish Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=365)

</column>

---

Increase the distance you Shove your opponent with Aggressive Block or Brutish Shove to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success. When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is flat-footed or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.
name: Flinging Shove
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Aggressive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=363) or [Brutish Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=365)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your opponets go even farther when push them around.
</summary>
summary: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.
summary_markdown: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Flinging Shove Source Core Rulebook pg. 151 4.0 Prerequisites Aggressive Block or Brutish Shove --- Increase the distance you Shove your opponent with Aggressive Block or Brutish Shove to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success. When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is flat-footed or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.
